args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Incorrect Location of Secondary Emergency Exit

Tiffin Motorhomes, Inc. (Tiffin) is recalling certain 2025 Zephyr motorhomes with floorplan 45PZ.  The secondary emergency exit is incorrectly located on the same side as the primary emergency exit.Incorrect placement of the emergency exit increases the risk of injury during an emergency.

Number of Units Affected: 3.0"
